Test Name: Immunoglobulin G (IgG) Subtypes Immunofluorescence in Tissue
Specimen Type: Fresh or formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue sections
Purpose: To detect and accurately report IgG subtypes (IgG1, IgG2, IgG3, IgG4) in tissue sections via immunofluorescence.
Container: Positively charged microscope slide with mounted tissue section
Equipment: Microscope slides, micropipettes, humidified chamber, fluorescence microscope, coverslips
